parameters.description: Gets or sets the page number to be fetched.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the number of items per page.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Gets or sets property to sort.

parameters.name: SortDirection
parameters.description: Gets or sets the direction of the sort, either "ASC" for ascending or "DESC" for descending.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Gets or sets the search filter.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description:
An optional comma-separated list of Project IDs (GUIDs) to filter the items.
If provided, only items associated with the specified projects will be returned.
Example: projectId=123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000,abcdefab-1234-5678-90ab-cdefabcdefab.

parameters.name: toolType
parameters.description: A value to filter by the tool's toolType.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: A value to filter by the tool's category. Categories are dependent on the tool type.

parameters.name: includeGlobal
parameters.description: A boolean flag indicating whether to include global tool definitions in the result.

parameters.name: excludeCategories
parameters.description: A boolean flag indicating whether to exclude tools in the specified categories.

allOf.description:
An AgentCard conveys key information:
- Overall details (version, name, description, uses)
- Skills: A set of capabilities the agent can perform
- Default modalities/content types supported by the agent.
- Authentication requirements.

agentCardId.description: Gets or sets the Unique identifier for the agent card.

- Authentication requirements.

RedactionStoreData.description:
Storage format for PostgreSQL JSONB - the ONLY format used for persistence.
Optimized for message-centric access patterns with O(1) message lookups.

messageRedactions.description:
Gets or sets message redactions: MessageId → PlaceholderText → RedactionRecord.
Primary access pattern for redaction operations.

Gets or sets context index for efficient bulk operations: Context → Set of MessageIds.
Enables O(M) filtering instead of O(C×M×P) traversal.

Serializable redaction record for storage in RedactionStoreData.
Contains all necessary information for redaction operations.

Gets or sets the confidence score from the policy engine (0.0-1.0).
Higher values indicate higher confidence in the violation detection.

startOffset.description: Gets or sets the character offset within the text where the violation starts.

placeholderIndex.description: Gets or sets the numeric index appended to the placeholder base.

contexts.description: Gets or sets the policy contexts that triggered this redaction.

violatingSubIndex.description: Gets or sets the subindex within the message for complex message types.

Gets or sets the maximum number of results to return.

Gets a dictionary from a data source GUID to an array of folder GUIDs.
Only these folder GUIDs will be used in the pipeline execution as an override to using all folders.
Folder GUIDs should be uploaded in the corresponding Data Source.
Folder GUIDs of files not present in the corresponding Data Source will be ignored.
If empty, all files in the data sources will be used.

dataSourceFiles.description:
Gets a dictionary from a data source GUID to an array of file GUIDs.
Only these file GUIDs will be used in the pipeline execution as an override to using all files.
File GUIDs should be uploaded in the corresponding Data Source.
File GUIDs of files not present in the corresponding Data Source will be ignored.
If empty, all files in the data sources will be used.

RedTeamingSecurityAnalyticsOverTime.description:
Represents combined security analytics data over time for Red Teaming campaigns.
Includes both OWASP vulnerabilities and MITRE attack tactics.

executionRatePercentage.description: Gets or sets the execution success rate as a percentage for this tactic on this date.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

ComponentResponse.description: Represents a component response containing component information and metadata.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the component.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the component.

securePostureProvider.description: Gets or sets the provider associated with the component.

externalId.description: Gets or sets the external identifier of the component.

externalType.description: Gets or sets the type of the component, if available.

externalTypeVersion.description: Gets or sets the version of the component type, if available.

componentType.description: Gets or sets the component type that distinguishes between AI models and other components.

credentialsCount.description: Gets or sets the number of credentials associated with the component, if available.

parametersCount.description: Gets or sets the number of parameters associated with the component, if available.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the component was created.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the component was last updated.

componentDictionary.description: Gets or sets the dictionary containing additional component properties and metadata.

aiModelName.description: Gets or sets the model name associated with the component, if available.

aiProviderName.description: Gets or sets the provider name used by this component.

aiSecurable.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this component can be secured, if available.

securedAt.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the component was secured, if available.

secureApiKeyId.description: Gets or sets the secure API key ID used for the component, if available.

securedStatus.description: Gets or sets the security status of the component.

securedNote.description: Gets or sets additional notes about the component's security status, if available.

SpmComponentType.description: Represents the type of secure posture management component.

ConnectionCreateResponse.description: Represents the response from a connection creation operation.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the created connection.

ConnectionCreateRequest.description: Represents a request to create a new SPM connection.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the connection.

securePostureProvider.description: Gets or sets the provider for the connection.

connection.description: Gets or sets the connection configuration as a key-value dictionary.

ConnectionUpdateRequest.description: Represents a request to update an existing SPM connection.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the connection.

connection.description: Gets or sets the updated connection configuration as a key-value dictionary, if provided.

AgentSecureResponse.description: Represents the response from an agent security operation.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the security operation.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the security operation.

message.description: Gets or sets the message describing the security operation result.

timestamp.description: Gets or sets the timestamp when the security operation was completed.

details.description: Gets or sets the detailed information about the security operation.

AgentSecureDetails.description: Represents detailed information about agent security configuration and credentials.

agentId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the agent.

workflowId.description: Gets or sets the workflow identifier associated with the agent.

modelId.description: Gets or sets the model identifier associated with the agent.

aiProviders.description: Gets or sets the AI service used by the agent.

aiModels.description: Gets or sets the AI model used by the agent.

gatewayUrl.description: Gets or sets the gateway URL for the agent.

responseTimeMs.description: Gets or sets the response time of the security operation in milliseconds.

credentialsCreated.description: Gets or sets a value indicating number of created credentials.

credentialNames.description: Gets or sets the names of the used credential, if any.

bedrockAgentId.description: Gets or sets the Bedrock Agent ID that handles routing through the gateway.

AgentSecureRequest.description: Represents a request to secure an agent with Airia Gateway credentials.

airiaGatewayUrl.description: Gets or sets the Airia Gateway URL.

gatewayConfigurationId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the gateway configuration.

TestConnectionCommand.description:
Command for testing an SPM connection.
This operation validates that a connection configuration is valid and can successfully connect to the external provider.

id.description:
Gets the optional ID of an existing SPM connection to use as base configuration.
If specified, the connection will be read from the database and missing parameters will be augmented.

name.description: Gets the name of the connection to test.

securePostureProvider.description: Gets the provider type for the connection.

connection.description: Gets the connection configuration as a key-value dictionary.

PagedResultOfAgentDirectoryResponse.description: Paged results for a T entity.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

AgentDirectoryResponse.description: Response model for agent directory listing.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the agent.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the agent.

provider.description: Gets or sets the provider type as a string.

status.description: Gets or sets the security status as a string.

modelNames.description: Gets or sets the comma-separated list of model names.

securityScore.description:
Gets or sets the security score from security analysis.
Null when SecurityScoreStatus is not Analyzed.

securityScoreStatus.description: Gets or sets the security score analysis status as a string.

models.description: Gets or sets the list of AI model components.

AgentModelComponent.description: Response model for individual model components within an agent.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the component.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the AI model.

aiProvider.description: Gets or sets the AI provider name.

status.description: Gets or sets the security status as a string.

GraphViewResponse.description:
Represents the complete graph view response containing provider and agent hierarchies
for displaying relationships between providers, agents, and AI models.

providers.description:
Gets or sets the list of providers with their associated agents.
Each provider is identified by its name (e.g., "N8n", "AwsBedrock") and contains
a list of agents that belong to connections using that provider.

agents.description:
Gets or sets the list of agents with their associated AI models.
Each agent contains a list of AI models (components) that are used within that agent,
providing the data needed to render agent-to-model relationships in the graph.

SpmProviderGraphNode.description:
Represents an SPM provider node in the graph view, containing the provider identifier
and its associated agents for visualization purposes.

id.description:
Gets or sets the provider identifier.
This uses the provider name as the identifier (e.g., "N8n", "AwsBedrock", "AzureFoundry")
instead of a GUID, to simplify UI processing and graph construction.

agents.description:
Gets or sets the list of agents associated with this provider.
Contains summary information about agents that belong to connections
using this secure posture provider, filtered to include only agents
that have AI model components.

SpmAgentSummary.description:
Represents a summary of an SPM agent for use in graph view provider nodes.
Contains minimal agent information needed for graph visualization.

id.description:
Gets or sets the unique identifier of the agent.
This uses the agent's GUID identifier for consistency with
agent references throughout the system.

name.description:
Gets or sets the display name of the agent.
This is the human-readable name that will be displayed
in the graph visualization for the agent node.

SpmAgentGraphNode.description:
Represents an SPM agent node in the graph view, containing the agent identifier
and its associated AI models for visualization purposes.

id.description:
Gets or sets the unique identifier of the agent.
This uses the agent's GUID identifier to maintain consistency
with existing agent references throughout the system.

models.description:
Gets or sets the list of AI models associated with this agent.
Contains summary information about AI model components that belong to this agent,
filtered to include only components with ComponentType.AiModel,
and using the AI model name as the identifier for simplified UI processing.

SpmModelSummary.description:
Represents a summary of an AI model component for use in graph view agent nodes.
Contains minimal model information needed for graph visualization.

id.description:
Gets or sets the identifier of the AI model.
This uses the AI model name as the identifier (e.g., "gpt-4.1-mini-2025-0414")
instead of a GUID, to simplify UI processing and graph construction
as specified in the requirements.

aiProvider.description:
Gets or sets the AI provider name associated with this model.
This indicates which AI provider (e.g., "OpenAI", "Anthropic") is used
for this model component, providing additional context in the graph view.

tools.description: Gets or sets the tools in response.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of the tools in response.

ToolDefinitionModel.description: Represents a flattened model of the tool definition, including all properties from the base entity.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the entity.

createdAt.description: Gets or sets the date and time when the entity was created.

updatedAt.description: Gets or sets the date and time when the entity was last updated.

toolType.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether flag that indicates if the tool is native.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the tool.

standardizedName.description: Gets or sets the standardized name of the tool.

description.description: Gets or sets a brief description of what the tool does.
examples: Use this tool to get the current weather in a given location.

methodType.description: Gets or sets a method type of the endpoint for the tool.

purpose.description: Gets or sets the purpose of the tool, providing context on what it is designed to achieve.
examples: When a user asks about the weather, including current conditions, forecasts, or specific weather events.

apiEndpoint.description: Gets or sets the Web API endpoint where the tool sends its requests to perform its task.

provider.description: Gets or sets the provider of the tool.

toolCredentials.description: Gets or sets the authentication properties for the tool.

headers.description: Gets or sets the headers required when making the API request.

body.description: Gets or sets the body of the request that the tool sends to the API.

bodyType.description: Gets or sets the body type of the request that the tool sends to the API.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the collection of parameters required by the tool to execute its function.

projectId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the project to which the tool is associated.

projectName.description: Gets or sets the name of the project to which the tool is associated.

project.description: Gets or sets the project that the prompt belongs to.

children.description: Gets or sets the children of the tool definition.

routeThroughACC.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool should route through the ACC.

shouldRedirect.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool should redirect with authorization header attached.

accGroup.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool should route through an ACC specific group.

documentation.description: Gets or sets the documentation of the tool.

tags.description: Gets or sets the documentation of the tool.

toolMetadata.description: Gets or sets the user provided parameters for the tool definition.

supportsPagination.description: Gets or sets the user provided parameters for the tool definition.

category.description: Gets or sets the category of the tool.

requestTimeout.description: Gets or sets the request timeout in seconds for tool execution. Default is 100 seconds.

toolCredentialSettings.description: Gets or sets the tool credential settings.

toolCredentials.description: Gets or sets the credentials for the tool.

toolCredentialsId.description: Gets or sets the authentication required to access the API.

authRequired.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether authentication is required for the tool.

useUserCredentials.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool should use user based credentials.

useUserCredentialsType.description: Gets or sets a value indicating what the credential type is when the tool use user based credentials.

credentialsSourceType.description: Gets or sets the Source Type.

useAiriaKeySupport.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tool can use airia key support.

availableCredentialTypes.description: Gets or sets the available credential types.

defaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value for the credential settings.

platformSupportedOAuthTypes.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the settings support oauth.

ToolHeaderModel.description: Represents a key-value pair header for a tool definition.

key.description: Gets or sets the key of the header.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the header.

ToolParameterModel.description:
Represents a parameter that a tool requires to function correctly. Each parameter provides details
about the type of data it expects, an optional description, and any default values or constraints that apply.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the parameter.

type.description: Gets or sets the data type of the parameter (e.g., string, int).

description.description: Gets or sets a brief description of the parameter, explaining its role within the tool.

default.description: Gets or sets the default value that will be used if no other value is provided.

validOptions.description: Gets or sets a list of valid options that the parameter can accept.

parameters.description: Gets or sets a list nested parameters.

requirement.description: Gets or sets the requirement level of the parameter.

ToolParameterRequirement.description: Specifies whether a tool parameter is required, optional, or an optional query parameter.

id.description: Gets or sets the project identifier.

name.description: Gets or sets the project name.

ToolsMetadataRequest.description: Represents a key-value pair header for a tool definition.

key.description: Gets or sets the key of the header.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the header.

name.description: Name of tool.

description.description: Description of tool.

parameters.description: Tool parameters.

name.description: Name of parameter.

description.description: Description of parameter.

McpGetAvailableToolsBody.description: Represents the body of a request to get available tools from an MCP server.

mcpServerUrl.description: Server URL to get parameters from.

credentialsSourceType.description: Source type for credentials (user-provided or library).

PagedResultOfToolDefinitionModel.description: Paged results for a T entity.

items.description: Gets or sets a list of items.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of items.

TestConnectionResult.description: Represents the result of a tool connection test.

isSuccessful.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the connection was successful.

message.description: Gets or sets the message for the connection result.

statusCode.description: Gets or sets the message for the connection result.

TestConnectionRequest.description: Request model for testing tool connections.

toolDefinition.description: Gets or sets the tool definition to test.

testConnectionParameters.description:
Gets or sets the test connection parameters as key-value pairs.
The query should be stored with "query" as the key.

AiGatewayToolsResponse.description: Response model for AI Gateway Tools.

tools.description: Gets or sets the list of AI Gateway tools.

AiGatewayTool.description: Represents an AI Gateway tool usage event.

name.description: Gets or sets the tool name.

inputParameters.description: Gets or sets the input parameters.
